channel.title: Hey guys
channel.description:
hey i thought since i was new id get to know all of the forum people. and so while getting to know them lets play a game
this game will be played by saying at the end of your post, something like , "taco's or swimming?" and you will chose and and take the 1 you chose and go such as this "swimming or internet" and so on.
to get to know one another ive made a small template for some small information
username: country?: gender: discribstion of myself:
and ill start!
username:zaperman101 country?:usa gender:male discribstion of myself:umm im mostly a internet geek with a gil freind in real life. :)
also, safe and in pain? or in dangerand feeling great?

item.title: Hey guys
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

this is not a question and we don’t allow forum games

Read full topic

item.title: Hey guys
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Who cares what your dad thinks, just do it.

Download, and use this theme:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/4988

It looks just like IE, than delete that desktop icon, and there you go.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey guys
item.dc:creator: @zaperman101 zaperman101
item.description:

casey, that go back to my dad being a ( cut for reason that it is a stick bodypart ) he wont let me download firefox because he thinks it is slow and not worth it, all because the libary has the old version and no java plugin. so you probly gonna have to look at my horrible spelling untill i can convince my dad to not be a total mother freaking **** head!
